EmailTemplate.description: Email notification when an award requires IOAA approval.
EmailTemplate.name: Award IOAA Approval Needed
EmailTemplate.subject: Employee award needs your approval.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!ApprovalRequest.Process_Approver},
An employee award needs your approval. Please visit this link to log into the Awards Reporting and Tracking Tool (ARTT) to approve or deny the request: {!ApprovalRequest.Internal_URL}.
Please contact your HRD Representative if you have any questions.
